title: Authentication bypass
author: Unknown
overview: The Microsoft Azure Active Directory Passport (aka Passport-Azure-AD) library 1.x before 1.4.6 and 2.x before 2.0.1 for Node.js does not recognize the validateIssuer setting, which allows remote attackers to bypass authentication via a crafted token.
recommendation: If using passport-azure-ad 1.x update to at least version 1.4.6, if using 2.x update to at least version 2.0.1
